name: faq_template
description: FAQ template with green geometric background and hexagonal Q&A sections

samples.question1: How do I start a return or exchange?
samples.answer1: Email us your order number to initiate the return or exchange process.
samples.question2: What if I received a damaged item?
samples.answer2: Send us photos right away. We'll arrange a replacement or full refund.

fieldPrompt.company_name: Enter your brand or company name (max 50 characters) that will be displayed in the top left corner. Examples: Your Company, Brand Name, etc.
fieldPrompt.question1: Enter the first FAQ question (max 100 characters) that will appear in the top hexagonal section. Examples: How do I start a return?, What is your return policy?
fieldPrompt.answer1: Enter the answer to the first question (max 200 characters). Be clear and helpful. Examples: Contact our support team, 30-day return window, etc.
fieldPrompt.question2: Enter the second FAQ question (max 100 characters) that will appear in the bottom hexagonal section. Examples: What if I received a damaged item?, How long do returns take?
fieldPrompt.answer2: Enter the answer to the second question (max 200 characters). Be clear and helpful. Examples: Send photos immediately, 5-7 business days, etc.
fieldPrompt.website_url: Enter your website URL (max 50 characters) that will be displayed at the bottom. Examples: yourwebsite.com, www.yourbrand.com
